patthana8.53:0.2_0: (This should be expanded in line with the teaching.)
patthana8.53:0.3_0: And he hit it on the ground.
patthana8.53:1.1_0: There is no shelter, no sagacity for oneself, and no cause for the reason why the Teaching arises.
patthana8.53:2.1_0: Nor do they remain for the sake of corrupt wishes ...
patthana8.53:3.1_0: There is no corrupt wishes to be corrupted, nor corrupted by oneself. Sitting by both oneself and another, and the teaching that causes. Nor do they arise because of cause.
